name: Industries Page Functionality
description: I want to view the industries Faberwork serves
So that I can see if they have expertise in my industry

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
the Industries page should load successfully
the page title should be "Industries We Serve"
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
I should see the following industries
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
the filter form should be present
the filter dropdown should be accessible
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
I click on the search button
the search field should be visible
I should be able to enter search terms

elements.name: Consultation form is accessible on Industries page

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
I scroll to the consultation form
the consultation form should be visible
all required form fields should be present
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
I scroll to the newsletter section
the newsletter email field should be visible
the newsletter submit button should be clickable

elements.name: Navigation elements work on Industries page

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "Industries" menu
all navigation links should be present
the Faberwork logo should be visible
I click on the logo
I should be redirected to the homepage

name: About Us Page Functionality
description: As a potential client or visitor
I want to learn about Faberwork's company and team
So that I can understand their background and expertise

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
the About page should load successfully
the page title should be "Who We Are"
I should see "Established 2003" text
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
I should see company overview information
I should see "Snowflake Partner Network" mentioned
I should see "enterprise application consulting" mentioned

elements.name: All leadership team members are displayed

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
I should see the following team members
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
I should see profile photos for team members
the photo for "Alok Pancholi" should be visible
the photo for "Yogesh Sharma" should be visible

elements.name: Read more functionality works for team bios

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
I click on a "Read more" button for team bio
the full bio content should be expanded
the button should change to "Read less"
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
I scroll to the bottom of the page
I should see "Let's Work Together" section
the "START NOW" button should be visible

elements.name: Navigation elements are present on About page

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I click on the "About us" menu
all navigation links should be present
the Faberwork logo should be visible
the footer should be visible

name: Carousel and Slider Functionality
description: I want to interact with carousels and sliders
So that I can view success stories and testimonials

steps.name: I am on the Faberwork homepage
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I scroll to the success stories section
the success stories carousel should be visible
carousel navigation buttons should be present
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the success stories carousel is visible
I click the carousel next button
the next carousel item should be displayed
the carousel should animate smoothly
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the success stories carousel is visible
I am on the second carousel item
I click the carousel previous button
the previous carousel item should be displayed
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the success stories carousel is visible
I wait for 5 seconds
the carousel should automatically advance to the next item
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I scroll to the testimonials section
the testimonial slider should be visible
testimonial quotes should be displayed
testimonials should rotate automatically
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the success stories carousel is visible
I click on carousel indicator 3
carousel item 3 should be displayed
the indicator should be highlighted
I am on the Faberwork homepage
I am viewing the carousel on a mobile device
I swipe left on the carousel
the next carousel item should appear
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the success stories carousel has focus
I press the right arrow key
the next carousel item should be displayed
I press the left arrow key
the previous carousel item should be displayed
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the success stories carousel is visible
there should be at least 10 carousel items
each item should have content
I am on the Faberwork homepage
the carousel is auto-rotating
I hover over the carousel
the carousel should pause auto-rotation
I move the mouse away
the carousel should resume auto-rotation
